Edit stack module

Source: R/plugin-stack.R
edit_stack.Rd

Customizable logic for editing stack attributes such as stack title.

Usage

edit_stack_server(id, stack_id, board, update, ...)

edit_stack_ui(id, x, ...)

Arguments

id

Namespace ID

stack_id

Stack ID

board

Reactive values object containing board information

update

Reactive value object to initiate board updates

...

Extra arguments passed from parent scope

x

Stack

Value

NULL

On this page
